hero.badge: 6 AI Agents Working in Perfect Harmony
hero.subtitle: Orchestrate <highlight>up to 6 Claude Code terminals</highlight> in parallel — with full visibility, Git tools, per-terminal file history, and a shared MCP-powered task system.
hero.powerStatement: Build faster with less friction and zero context switching
hero.authorityLine: Built for developers who rely on AI every day. A faster, clearer way to work with multiple AI agents at once.
hero.requirements: Works with your Claude Code subscription. Requires macOS 12 or later.

conversationHistory.title: Conversation History

problem.titleLine1: Working with a single AI agent
problem.description: When your entire workflow depends on one AI chat or terminal, things get messy fast. Context switching, repeated prompts, lost threads, and invisible changes kill productivity.

painPoints.noView: No clear view of what the AI is editing.
painPoints.repeating: Sessions lose context and you repeat prompts.
painPoints.confidence: Hard to trust AI changes without visibility.

solution.description: CodeAgentSwarm turns Claude Code into a fully coordinated environment where up to six agents work in parallel, with total visibility over tasks, context, and file changes.

points.git: Integrated Git panel with diffs and commit context.
points.kanban: MCP-powered Kanban your agents can update.
points.mcp: MCP Marketplace: GitHub, Notion, Slack, Supabase, Brave Search, Playwright, PostgreSQL, and more.
points.fileTracking: Full file tracking so you always know what changed.

multiTerminal.title: Multiple Agents in Parallel
multiTerminal.description: Run up to 6 Claude Code agents simultaneously. Each one in its own terminal, working on different tasks.

taskWorkflow.title: AI-Powered Task Management
taskWorkflow.description: Integrated Kanban board that agents can read and update. Tasks sync automatically across all terminals.

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.description: Know instantly when an agent finishes, needs input, or encounters an error. Never miss a beat.

visibility.title: Real-Time Status & Changes
visibility.description: Dynamic terminal titles, live file changes, and instant visibility into what each agent is doing.

history.title: Conversation History
history.description: Full searchable history of all your chats. Find any past decision, explanation, or code snippet instantly.

turboMode.title: Turbo Mode & Visual Permissions
turboMode.description: Go fast with confidence. Turbo Mode auto-approves safe actions while visual permission controls keep you in charge.

workflow.title: 3× Workflow Speed
workflow.subtitle: Parallel agents reduce waiting time and context switching.

agents.title: 6 Agents, Zero Bottlenecks
agents.subtitle: Run tasks simultaneously with full visibility.

insight.title: Instant Code Insight
insight.subtitle: Live file history and Git diffs that keep you in control.

search.title: Search Anything
search.subtitle: Find past chats, decisions, and explanations in seconds.

socialProof.title: Loved by
socialProof.subtitle: Join thousands of developers who have transformed their workflow

alex.quote: Running backend, frontend, and tests in parallel completely changed the way I work.
alex.author: Alex C.

maria.quote: The MCP Kanban keeps agents aligned without repeating prompts.
maria.author: Maria S.

david.quote: File history per terminal finally made me trust AI with real code.
david.author: David P.

hero.headline: Join the Open Beta
hero.subheadline: Get the full Pro experience at no cost. Run 6 AI agents in parallel, Git integration, Kanban, MCP tools and more.
hero.microcopy: Works on macOS (Apple Silicon). Requires a Claude Code subscription.

step1.title: Fill in the beta form
step1.description: Tell us your email and basic setup so we can prepare your Pro (Beta) access.

step2.title: Download the app & create your account
step2.description: Install CodeAgentSwarm on macOS and sign in with the SAME email (Google, GitHub or Discord login supported).

step3.title: Join our Discord & share feedback
step3.description: Joining the CodeAgentSwarm Discord is REQUIRED for the beta, since feedback is a condition for free Pro access.

howToJoin.note: No credit card required. Full Pro access during the beta in exchange for your feedback.

form.socialProof: Already used by early testers shipping apps 3x faster.

pricing.banner: During the Open Beta, the Pro tier is 100% free. Create your account, submit your email and we'll unlock Pro for you.

banner.text: We're in Open Beta - Get the full Pro experience for free

items.a1: Yes. During the Open Beta, the entire Pro tier is free - all features unlocked, no credit card required.
items.q2: Do I need a Claude Code subscription?
items.a2: Yes. CodeAgentSwarm works on top of Claude Code, which powers all agentic reasoning, coding, parallel tasks and MCP tools. You need an active Claude Code subscription to run the agents.
items.a3: Highly recommended. If you work on multiple projects, heavy refactors, large codebases or parallel tasks, Max delivers better performance and higher request limits.
items.q4: Why do I need to join Discord?
items.a4: Beta requires feedback. Discord is where we post updates, take feedback, fix bugs, and share Beta builds.
items.q5: What happens when the Beta ends?
items.a5: You choose: stay on Free, upgrade to Pro, or stop using the app. No automatic charges. Founders who join during the beta will keep the original Pro price forever.
items.a7: No. All code stays on your local machine.
items.q8: How long does Pro activation take?
items.a8: Usually a few hours after you complete all steps.
